node.title: Together- Part 2
node.description: This sermon follows "Together," Pastor Ferraz's 07/16/16 message about evangelical Nick Hall's call for 1 Million Christians to stand "Together" at the Mall in Washington D. C., forget denominational differences unite and "recalibrate Christianity." "Together, Part 2," highlights October 31, 2016, as the countdown of ecumenical events to end the Protestant Reformation by October 31, 2017, it's 500th anniversary, in Wittenberg, Germany.
